text: Karl Leiter (1890-1957) was an Austrian screenwriter and film director. ==Selected filmography== * Queen Draga (1920) * Pratermizzi (1927) * Father Radetzky (1929) * The Missing Wife (1929) * Das Ferienkind (1943) * Ich bitte um Vollmacht (1944) * Emperor's Ball (1956) * Wiener Luft (1958) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1890 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Film people from Vienna
title: Karl Leiter
